definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Astana, on the other hand, was perfectly placed in the very centre of the country.
sentences.chinese: 而阿斯塔納則正坐落於國家的中心。

sentences.english: Succession has become the electric current that runs through Astana.
sentences.chinese: 總統連任的心聲像一股電流穿過了整個的阿斯塔納。

sentences.english: They also exchanged views on the SCO Astana Summit to be held in June.
sentences.chinese: 雙方還就上合組織阿斯塔納峯會交換了意見。

sentences.english: Astana is clean, orderly and seemingly sedated.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯塔納乾淨整潔，秩序井然，超凡脫俗。

sentences.english: The Chinese foreign minister arrived in the Kazakh capital of Astana on December 27 for an official visit.
sentences.chinese: 楊潔篪於27日抵達阿斯塔納進行正式訪問。

sentences.english: Astana’s architectural style can best be described as idiosyncratic.
sentences.chinese: 對阿斯塔納建築風格的最好描述就是氣度不凡。
